glosses: to shout, to scream, to exclaim

examples.text: Yazın üç sütun üstüne kapkara haykıran puntolarla : / Nâzım Hikmet vatan hainliğine devam ediyor hâlâ.
examples.translation: Write on three columns of jet-black font that cry: / Nâzım Hikmet continues to be a traitor to the homeland.

examples.text: Haykıracak nefesim kalmasa bile / Ellerim uzanır olduğun yere
examples.translation: Even if I don’t have enough breath left to shout / My hands will still reach to where you are

etymology: Cognate with Old Turkic [script needed] (aykïr-, “to shout; applaud, cheer”), Azerbaijani hayqırmaq, Turkmen haýkyrmak, and Uzbek hayqirmoq.
